channel.title: Products on HBMWireMesh - Famous Stainless Steel Wire Mesh Manufactor in China
channel.description: Recent content in Products on HBMWireMesh - Famous Stainless Steel Wire Mesh Manufactor in China

item.title: Aluminum Wire Mesh
item.description: DESCRIPTION Aluminum is largely considered the most popular non-ferrous metal in the world, and as such, aluminum alloys are commonly used in the wire mesh industry.

item.title: Brass Wire Mesh
item.description: DESCRIPTION The presence of zinc in brass woven wire mesh is important because it provides added abrasion resistance and allows for higher tensile strengths; it also hardens the mesh, compared to its softer copper woven wire mesh counterpart.

item.title: BRC 3315 Roof Wire Mesh
item.description: DESCRIPTION Made of selected quality iron wires through high precision processing

item.title: Crimped Wire Mesh
item.description: Crimped wire mesh is constructed of wires that have been crimped prior to weaving them together in a loom.

item.title: Dutch Wire Mesh
item.description: Description Dutch Weave mesh/ Hollander Weave mesh Feature: – Material quality 201, 304, 316, 316L,904L grade stainless steel and mild steel wire.

item.title: Galvanized Welded Wire Mesh
item.description: DESCRIPTION Galvanized welded wire mesh is made of high quality low carbon steel wire.

item.title: Mesh Disc
item.description: DESCRIPTION Wire Mesh discs serve as spare parts for rescreening filter plates in horizontal centrifugal filters or as fitted components in filters for polymer filtration.

item.title: PVC Coated Welded Wire Mesh
item.description: DESCRIPTION Heavy Type Welded Wire Mesh is different from other kind of welded wire mesh for its super big wire diameter, or big opening size, or big width.

item.title: PVC Coated Welded Wire Mesh
item.description: PVC Coated Welded Mesh Size: Material: Low carbon steel wire, electro galvanized iron wire, hot dipped galvanized iron wire Production: firstly welding, and then PVC coating Colour of PVC coating: dark green, ligh green, black, blue,yellow,etc Hole size: 1/4", 1/2", 3/4", 1", 1-1/2", 2", 3"etc.

item.title: Quarry Screen Mesh
item.description: DESCRIPTION Quarry screen mesh Feature: High Tensile Woven Wire Mesh Aperture: 1.

item.title: Stainless Steel Welded Wire Mesh
item.description: Stainless Steel Welded Wire Mesh Feature: Corrosion resistant, Strong consistent welds, Long material life Rodent proofing gardens and homes Ventilating attics with soffit screens Reinforcing buildings with infill panels Heating spaces with radiator grills Farming with tractor grills Food drying on wire racks Equipping chimney tops with spark arrestors Parameters Product Name Stainless Steel Welded Wire Mesh material SUS 201,304,316,316L,310S,904L….

item.title: Stainless Steel Wire Mesh
item.description: Stainless Steel Wire Mesh is widely used in industries such as: Petroleum & Chemical Environmental Protection Mining Aerospace Paper Making Electronic Metallurgical Food & Pharmaceutical Filtration & Separation Weave Type This is sample image Parameters Material: SS 201, 202, 304, 316, 316L, 321, 430, 310S, 2205, 2207,904L etc.
